main event: Several disks or spheres were observed in the vicinity of Somerset, Pennsylvania on July 19, 1954.
interesting points: The objects were varying in size from about 40 to 140 ft in diameter., The objects were observed moving at a speed of approximately 1,000 miles per hour., Witnesses included four reliable adults, not given to imagination., The objects were metallic and highly polished, reflecting sunlight., This was not the first sighting of such objects in the area, indicating a pattern of similar reports.
witness description: two men and two women, intelligent and reliable
